name: Cyborg Ninja vs. The Third Reich
description: Cyborg Ninja vs. The Third Reich is a 2D action platforming game! Become a Cyborg Ninja and destroy the Nazi menace in this throwback to the 16 bit side scrolling glory days!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Later Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 75 MB available space Additional Notes: *Xbox 360/One Controller Recommended
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64bit Processor: 2 GHz Quad Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1280x720 Resolution Support Required for Fullscreen Additional Notes: *60hz monitor setting recommended
